channel.title: 317 PI Adding Donater Symbol To Chat [No Client Sided] [PLEASE HELP]
channel.description:
The symbol is already in the client... i'm trying to add it next to the players name when they talk, i cannot find it, its 317 PI, Does anyone know where this is located, Ive LOOKED EVERYWHERE!!!!
OF THE FILE I SHOULD LOOK IN TO EDIT IT!! <img=0> = Donater <img=1> = Mod <img=2> = Admin/Owner

item.title: 317 PI Adding Donater Symbol To Chat [No Client Sided] [PLEASE HELP]

item.description:
@Just_Lurkin wrote:

Do the donators have a symbol in the game different then that 1?
If they have nothing its really complicated to add 1…
